name: shared-wallet
description: Solidity smart contracts created online in Remix editor. ## Features and goals: - on-chain wallet smart contract, - store funds and withdraw them, - control access by ownership & allowance mechanism, - reuse already existing OpenZeppelin smart contract ## Real world use cases: - control by allowance expences employee on buisness trip, - allowance for children to spend funds per week/per month etc., - give contractors allowance to spend certain amount of funds ### Instalation Feel free to just copy code to [Remix](http://remix.ethereum.org).
